query.text: Load logged OWL data for the XSens dataset

query.q: owl_subclass_of(T, knowrob:'StorageConstruct'), class_properties(T, knowrob:'typePrimaryFunction-StoragePlaceFor', knowrob:'Perishable'), owl_individual_of(Obj, T), highlight_object_with_children(Obj).
query.text: What is the storage place for perishable items?

query.q: owl_has(EVENT, 'http://knowrob.org/kb/datalabel.owl#objectActedOn', knowrob:'drawer_sinkblock_dishwasher'), owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'ClosingSomething'), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'startTime',T0), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'endTime',T1).
query.text: When was the dish washer closed?
Which events occurred that acted on dinner plates?

query.q: owl_individual_of(OBJ, knowrob:'DinnerPlate'), owl_has(EVENT, 'http://knowrob.org/kb/datalabel.owl#objectActedOn', OBJ),  owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'TakingSomething'), owl_has(EVENT,'http://knowrob.org/kb/datalabel.owl#bodyPartsUsed',PART), owl_individual_of(PART, knowrob:'AnimalBodyPart').
query.text: Which body part(s) were used for dinner plate taking events?

query.q: owl_individual_of(OBJ, knowrob:'DinnerPlate'), owl_has(EVENT, 'http://knowrob.org/kb/datalabel.owl#objectActedOn', OBJ),  owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'TakingSomething'), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'startTime',T0), add_human_pose(xsens:'XSensHuman1', T0).
query.text: How was the human pose when dinner plate taking events started?

query.q: owl_individual_of(OBJ, knowrob:'DinnerPlate'), owl_has(EVENT, 'http://knowrob.org/kb/datalabel.owl#objectActedOn', OBJ),  owl_individual_of(EVENT, knowrob:'TakingSomething'), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'startTime',T0), owl_has(EVENT,knowrob:'endTime',T1), owl_has(EVENT,'http://knowrob.org/kb/datalabel.owl#bodyPartsUsed',PART), owl_individual_of(PART, knowrob:'AnimalBodyPart'), owl_has(PART, srdl2comp:'urdfName', literal(type(_,URDF))), add_trajectory(URDF, T0, T1, 0.1).
query.text: What was the trajectory of endeffectors for dinner plate taking events?
